Each participant consume six different breakfast six different occasion separate 1 week wash-out period : three rye porridge supplement three different combination add fermentable dietary fibre plant protein , two non-supplemented rye porridge differ amount rye one wheat bread . Participants rate subjective appetite ( satiety , hunger desire eat ) use visual analog scale ( VAS ) every 30 min 8-hour period , start 30 min breakfast . The concentration hydrogen methane breath , indicator bacterial fermentation dietary fibre , measure every hour . Blood sample collect breakfast regular interval throughout day analysis glucose hormone level .
